Title: Gov Abiodun praises Remo Stars for unprecedented NPFL title
Summary: Ogun State Governor, Prince Dapo Abiodun, has extolled the commitment and determination of Remo Stars Football Club for its victory .

Title: Let Oyo, Osun resolve boundary dispute peacefully, commissioner urges agitators
Summary: Oyo State Government has warned agitators in the Oyo/Osun boundary dispute to sheathe their sword . In a statement by the Commissioner .

Title: EFCC arrests Lagos socialite, E-Money, over alleged naira abuse
Summary: Emeka Okonkwo Daniel, also known as E-Money, was picked up by operatives of the commission on Monday in Lagos . The Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) has arrested popular Lagos socialite .

Title: Okpebholo cautions against renewed cult violence in Edo
Summary: Edo State Government on Tuesday cautioned against the resurgence of cult-related violence in some parts of the state . Okpebholo cautions against renewed cult violence in Edo .

Title: UNSC decries small arms, weapon management failure, urges action
Summary: The United Nations Security Council has decried the increase in conflicts and forced displacement across the globe in recent years . The UN Chargé d’Affaires, Ambassador Dorothy, said the Council has failed to deliver on its primary purpose .

Summary: Civil Society Organisations, CSOs, numbering 21, asserted that 183 people were alleged killed in the third week of April 2025 alone in Benue and Plateau States .

Title: UTME: We spend over N200,000 to support every deaf candidate – JAMB
Summary: It’s expensive; over N200,000 is spent per candidate, but it is a cost worth bearing,” the board disclosed .

Title: Nigeria deploys 35 medical professionals to Tanzania
Summary: The Nigerian Technical Aid Corps (NTAC), says it is deploying 35 medical professionals to Zanzibar, Tanzania, to bridge both the educational and professional gaps in that country . Dr Yusuf Yakub, the Director General (DG) of NTAC speaking at the deployment of the professionals comprising nurses and doctors said on Tuesday in Abuja, that the exercise was an 'exercise'

Title: Pageantry suspended in Taraba for six months
Summary: The leadership of the entertainment industry in Taraba State has suspended all beauty pageant activities for six months . President of the Forum, Hycienth Haruna, announced the decision while addressing the press on Tuesday in Jalingo, the state capital .

Title: Atiku’ll leave PDP – Okowa
Summary: Atiku Abubakar will also declare his support for President Bola Tinubu to complete a second term in office . He added that he added that Atiku would also declare support for the President to continue his second term .
